GSD.description:
xen/netfront: force data bouncing when backend is untrusted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit 4923217af5742a796821272ee03f8d6de15c0cca. For more details please see the references link.
